players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Oh no, Charlie is dead! I was hoping to hear from them first. We need to be careful with our votes today."
You: "Charlie is dead. This is very concerning. We need to figure out who did this. I don't have any special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share your thoughts and observations."
Bob: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Diana: "I am the detective and I investigated Bob last night. He is the mafioso! Don't be fooled by his false claim."
Bob: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and she is mafia. Vote Diana to win."

You: "This is a lot to process. Bob claims Diana is mafia, and Diana claims Bob is mafia. Both claim to be the detective. Since Charlie is dead, one of them is lying and is likely the mafia. I don't have any information to go on,..."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

Diana was arrested
